overview: A gritty, honest and beautiful tale of a working class family in South Texas caught up in a dysfunctional cycle of seedy traditions, and their search for a way out. Based on a true story.  Director Jeremiah Ocanas Writers Gabriela Lopez de Dennis(screenplay)Jeremiah Ocanas(original story & screenplay) Stars Amber Shana WilliamsMia RuizSantiago Villalobos
title: B.O.O.S.T.
